languages.text: Один из множества ваших портретов, развешанных по станции подобно иконам. Какой-то обыватель лобызает край его рамы в надежде получить благословение династии фон Валанциус.

One of your numerous portraits that grace the station, not unlike the images of the saints. Some commoner is kissing the edge of the portrait's frame, hoping thus to earn the blessing of House von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Один из множества ваших портретов, развешанных по станции подобно иконам. Какой-то обыватель лобызает край его рамы в надежде получить благословение династии фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: One of your numerous portraits that grace the station, not unlike images of saints. Some commoner is kissing the edge of the portrait's frame, hoping thus to earn the blessing of House von Valancius.

One of your numerous portraits that grace the station, not unlike the images of the saints. Some commoner is kissing the edge of the portrait's frame, hoping thus to earn the blessing of House von Valancius.

One of your numerous portraits that grace the station, not unlike the images of the saints. Some commoner is kissing the edge of the portrait's frame, hoping thus to earn the blessing of House von Valancius.

languages.text: 这是一幅关于你的肖像画，与圣人的画像别无二致。一群平民正在亲吻画框，希望能够获得冯·瓦兰修斯家族的祝福。
languages.original_text: One of your numerous portraits that grace the station, not unlike the images of the saints. Some commoner is kissing the edge of the portrait's frame, hoping thus to earn the blessing of House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: 这是一幅关于你的肖像画，与圣人的画像别无二致。一群平民正在亲吻画框，希望能够获得冯·瓦兰修斯家族的祝福。

languages.text: 駅に飾られている数多くの肖像画のひとつ。聖人像とそう遠くもない。フォン・ヴァランシウス家の祝福を得ようと、肖像画の額縁に口づけする一般市民までいる。
languages.original_text: One of your numerous portraits that grace the station, not unlike the images of the saints. Some commoner is kissing the edge of the portrait's frame, hoping thus to earn the blessing of House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: 駅に飾られている数多くの肖像画のひとつ。聖人像とそう遠くもない。フォン・ヴァランシウス家の祝福を得ようと、肖像画の額縁に口づけする一般市民までいる。

languages.text: Uno de tus numerosos retratos que adornan la estación, como imágenes de santos. Un plebeyo está besando el marco del retrato, esperando así ganarse la bendición de la casa von Valancius.
languages.original_text: One of your numerous portraits that grace the station, not unlike the images of the saints. Some commoner is kissing the edge of the portrait's frame, hoping thus to earn the blessing of House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Uno de tus numerosos retratos que adornan la estación, como imágenes de santos. Un plebeyo está besando el marco del retrato, esperando así ganarse la bendición de la casa von Valancius.

languages.text: Eines der zahlreichen Porträts von dir, welche die Station zieren, ähnlich wie Heiligenbilder. Ein Mitglied des Pöbels küsst den Rand des Bilderrahmens, in der Hoffnung, so den Segen des Hauses Valancius zu erlangen.
languages.original_text: One of your numerous portraits that grace the station, not unlike the images of the saints. Some commoner is kissing the edge of the portrait's frame, hoping thus to earn the blessing of House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: Eines der zahlreichen Porträts von dir, welche die Station zieren, ähnlich wie Heiligenbilder. Ein Mitglied des Pöbels küsst den Rand des Bilderrahmens, in der Hoffnung, so den Segen des Hauses Valancius zu erlangen.

languages.text: L'un de vos nombreux portraits qui ornent la station, semblable à la représentation d'{mf|un saint|une sainte}. Vous voyez une personne embrasser le cadre du portrait, sans doute dans l'espoir d'obtenir la bénédiction de la maison von Valancius.
languages.original_text: One of your numerous portraits that grace the station, not unlike the images of the saints. Some commoner is kissing the edge of the portrait's frame, hoping thus to earn the blessing of House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: L'un de vos nombreux portraits qui ornent la station, semblable à la représentation d'{mf|un saint|une sainte}. Vous voyez une personne embrasser le cadre du portrait, sans doute dans l'espoir d'obtenir la bénédiction de la maison von Valancius.

languages.text: İstasyonu güzelleştiren sayısız portrelerden bir tanesi de seninki ve azizlerin suretlerinden çok da farklı değil. Avamdan birkaç kişi, von Valancius Hanesi'nin kutsamasına nail olma umuduyla portrenin çerçevesinin köşesini öpüyor.
languages.original_text: One of your numerous portraits that grace the station, not unlike the images of the saints. Some commoner is kissing the edge of the portrait's frame, hoping thus to earn the blessing of House von Valancius.

traits.locale_text: İstasyonu güzelleştiren sayısız portrelerden bir tanesi de seninki ve azizlerin suretlerinden çok da farklı değil. Avamdan birkaç kişi, von Valancius Hanesi'nin kutsamasına nail olma umuduyla portrenin çerçevesinin köşesini öpüyor.
